示例只展示简单用法，详细内容请查看官方文档： angular-carousel

轮播插件

插件demo如下：

  • #{{ slide.id }}

插件代码如下：

				JS代码
				
				$scope.slides = [{
					id:1,
					img:"img/slide1.jpg"
				},{
					id:2,
					img:"img/slide2.jpg"
				},{
					id:3,
					img:"img/slide3.jpg"
				}];
				
				Html代码
				
				<div class="carousel-demo">
					<ul rn-carousel rn-carousel-index="carouselIndex" rn-carousel-buffered rn-carousel-auto-slide = "5"
						rn-carousel-pause-on-hover rn-carousel-controls rn-carousel-controls-allow-loop rn-carousel-duration = "300"
						rn-carousel-transition = "hexagon" class="carousel1">
						<li ng-repeat="slide in slides track by slide.id" ng-class="'id-' + slide.id">
							<div ng-style="{'background-image': 'url(' + slide.img + ')'}">
								#{{ slide.id }}
							</div>
						</li>
					</ul>
					<div rn-carousel-indicators ng-if="slides.length > 1" slides="slides" rn-carousel-index="carouselIndex"></div>
				</div>
